gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 116, Hornets 114
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Hornets, 116-114. Duncan Robinson recorded 24 points (5-9 3pt. FG), seven rebounds and four assists for the Heat, while Jimmy Butler added 23 points, four rebounds and eight assists in the victory. Terry Rozier led all scorers with 34 points, along with 13 assists and a season-high eight 3PM for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 13-10 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 7-14.
